title: Application complete
successParagraph1: We will contact you when we have received your documents. We will then review your application and issue your grant of probate within 8 weeks.
successParagraph1NoDocumentsRequired: We will review your application and issue your grant of probate within 8 weeks.
successParagraph2: You do not need to do anything until then.
successParagraph3: We’ll email you if we need any more information. You can also call the Probate Registry on {helpLineNumber} if you have any questions.
successParagraph4: Find out what to do when you receive your grant of probate (opens in a new window).
survey: This is a new service â€“ your feedback will help us to improve it (opens in a new window).
saveParagraph1: You can save or print these documents for your reference.
